inclusion.criterion: essential tremor with a history of ethanol responsiveness
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: off any medications used to treat essential tremor such as mysoline or propranolol for at least 2 weeks
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: abnormalities on neurologic exam other than tremor
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: renal failure, hepatic failure and chronic lung disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of tremors since a year ago. He has Wilson disease confirmed by high liver copper concentration.
